inc.elevati.imycity.main.new_report_fragment

Class NewReportFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • inc.elevati.imycity.main.new_report_fragment.NewReportFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, MainContracts.NewReportView

    public class NewReportFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements MainContracts.NewReportView
    This fragment contains the report creating form; It also handles the database sending delegating it to its presenter

      static class  NewReportFragment.PersistentData
      ViewModel subclass to preserve the loaded image across orientation changes and activity re-creation; the data is lost when activity is destroyed by system or user

        public void dismissProgressDialog(boolean error)
        Dismisses the progress dialog after a report sending
        Specified by:
        dismissProgressDialog in interface MainContracts.NewReportView
        Parameters:
        error - should be true if the operation didn't complete If false the fragments fields (ImageView and EditText for title and description) are cleared

        Overrides:
        onActivityResult in class android.support.v4.app.Fragment
        Parameters:
        requestCode - the request code, can be PICK_IMAGE_REQUEST or TAKE_PHOTO_REQUEST
        resultCode - the activity result code, it must be RESULT_OK to continue
        data - an Intent containing the returned data
